definition: Rowling (name)/Joanne Kathleen Rowling (1965-), author of the Harry Potter series of novels

sentences.english: Rowling will have to think up something clever for this one.
sentences.chinese: 羅琳必須想一個高明的籍口才能自圓其說。

sentences.english: Also, Rowling described the Luna-commentated match as "the last Quidditch match."
sentences.chinese: 而且羅琳會描寫盧娜解說“魁地奇的最後一戰”。

sentences.english: By that time, Rowling had been through a failed marriage.
sentences.chinese: 當時羅琳已經歷了一次失敗的婚姻。

sentences.english: Her disheveled appearance when she arrives is meat for Caroline's gossip, but Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 她到達時的狼狽相，爲卡羅琳說長道短提供了話柄。
羅琳在埃克塞特讀了大學。

sentences.english: Bingley's sister Caroline is interested in Darcy herself.
sentences.chinese: 彬格萊的妹妹卡羅琳本身對達西頗感興趣。

sentences.english: As she sat, Lucia gave a wan smile of gratitude to Caroline Amory.
sentences.chinese: 露西婭坐下，衝着卡羅琳感激地笑了笑。

sentences.english: And what if Rowling  kills off Harry in the final book?
sentences.chinese: 但是如果羅琳在最後一本書把哈利寫死了怎麼辦？

sentences.english: And now, I’ll hand you over to Caroline.
sentences.chinese: 現在請允許我向各位介紹卡羅琳。

sentences.english: His sister Caroline gave him his first lessons.
sentences.chinese: 姐姐卡羅琳教會了他許多人生第一課。

sentences.english: Mabel Griep and her sister Loreen lived next door to the Wright Brothers.
sentences.chinese: 格里普和妹妹羅琳當時住在萊特兄弟的隔壁。
卡羅琳是一名時裝設計師。

sentences.english: I think I'm most looking forward to Rowling's detailed explanation of Quidditch.
sentences.chinese: 我想最希望看到羅琳關於魁地奇的詳細解釋。

sentences.english: Caroline and Douglas will be there too.
sentences.chinese: 卡羅琳和道格拉斯也將出席。
我堅決地說，“卡羅琳，拜託，掉頭吧。”

definition: Brooklyn, borough of New York City

pinyin: Ni2 ya4 jia1 la1 Pu4 bu4

definition: domestic flight/internal line (air, train, ferry etc)

outer area (of a place that has an inner area)/dining area of a restaurant (as opposed to the kitchen)/outfield (baseball etc)/area outside a venue (e.g. exterior of a stadium)/field (maintenance, testing etc)/(Chinese opera) the area in front of the table on the stage
